name: Green Friend
description:
Take a friend under your wing and try to protect him!

Don't let yourself get hit otherwise plant will be taken away from you, if this happens you need to return it, otherwise you will lose. 

This is my first jam project, and my second overall. Do not judge strictly =), and I immediately apologize for the huge number of bugs.

I'm a beginner developer, I decided to try my hand at jam, I'm waiting for criticism to improve my performance. 

While it is difficult to call it a game, but some mechanics already exist, except spawner.
